alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 3:54PM EDT until June 28 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/ FOR EAST CENTRAL DICKINSON...NORTHWESTERN DELTA AND SOUTHEASTERN MARQUETTE COUNTIES... At 354 PM EDT/254 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Watson, or 28 miles south of Ishpeming, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Watson around 400 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
